column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you want awesome Chicago style deep dish
column2: you will have a hard time finding a better place than this.  Absolutely incredible deep dish pizza.  The sauce has a sweetness to it that other deep dish pizza places in Chicago don't have.  I usually order straight up cheese
column3: because that's just how I like my deep dish.  You can also put your order in as soon as you arrive
column4: so by the time you sit down
column5: it shouldn't be too long until you can devour your delicious pizza.  Pretty cool decor as well
column6: with Chicago sports memorabilia all over.
